title: Laser Machinegun
summaries: The Laser Machinegun is a Hardmode, post-Golem magic weapon that will spin up for roughly two seconds, with each shot firing two inaccurate blue lasers. Like the Razorpine, the projectiles do not pierce through enemies. The Laser Machinegun has a 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being dropped by the Martian Saucer from the Martian Madness event.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
